0000111011111110 1100000100111111 0 -> sum: 1101000000111101, cout: 0
1000110000011010 0110010100010000 0 -> sum: 1111000100101010, cout: 0
1111110111010101 1000011011001001 0 -> sum: 1000010010011110, cout: 1

0110100001000010 1111001001110010 1 -> sum: 0101101010110101, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
